description: Bordered triangulations of sphere with n nodes.
references: H. Heesch, Ein zum Vierfarbensatz aquivalenter Satz der Panisochromie [ A theorem of panisochromaticity equivalent to the four color theorem ], pp. 229-253 of Graph Theory in Memory of G. A. Dirac (Sandbjerg, 1985). Edited by L. D. Andersen et al., Annals of Discrete Mathematics, 41. North-Holland Publishing Co., Amsterdam-New York, 1989.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
